MODULE.name: Sip
MODULE.MORE_HELP: This is example of API. Implementation contain in extension.

METHOD.name: hide
METHOD.DESC: hides the sip if it is displayed.

REMARK.title: General
REMARK.DESC: Note that some devices may not support all the API's or there is a possiblities of discrepancy across BSP's & platforms.

REMARK.title: General
REMARK.DESC: In Android the Sip behaviour is platform and device dependent. Currently, show() will NOT put focus into desired input area.
